NanoObjectDetection.AdjustSettings module¶

Created on Fri Feb 15 16:41:17 2019

@author: Ronny Förster und Stefan Weidlich

This module tries to hell the user finding the correct parameters for the analysis

AskDoItAgain()[source]¶

Ask if a step shall be repeated

AskIfUserSatisfied(QuestionForUser)[source]¶

Ask if user is satisfied

AskMethodToImprove()[source]¶
Ask which method shall be applied to improve the particle IDENTIFICATION ‘1 - Bright (isolated) spots not recognized
‘
‘2 - Spots where nothing is to be seen
‘
‘3 - Bright (non-isolated) spots not recognized but you would like to have them both
‘
‘4 - Much more recognized spots than I think I have particles

‘)

FindROI(rawframes_np)[source]¶

Show the max of all images to show where the ROI is.

FindSpot(rawframes_ROI, ParameterJsonFile)[source]¶

Main function to optimize the parameters for particle identification It runs the bead finding routine and ask the user what problem he has According to the problem it tries to improve

GetIntegerInput(MessageOnScreen)[source]¶

Ask for an INTERGER input on the console.

GetNumericalInput(MessageOnScreen)[source]¶

Ask for a FLOAT input on the console

SpotSize(rawframes_rot, ParameterJsonFile)[source]¶

Optimize the diameter of the Particles
